{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ubiquiti Networks |model=AFi |revision=-R |upc=810354026089 |ean=0810354026096 |asin=B07RQMV2Z8, B01L9O07FS,B01L9O08PW, |newegg=9SIAA7W8WD4010 |fcc_date=06/20/2016 |is_manuf=No |manuf=PloTech |availability=now |type=wireless router, mesh node |fcc_id=SWX-AFR |ic_id=6545A-AFR |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1.7 |pwr_conn=USB Type C |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A; |cpu1_cspeed=750 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L25635FMI-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W971GG6SB-25 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880-BR4A;QCA9880-BR4A; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327N;AR8327N-BL1A; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=120MHz 32-bit ARM Cortex-M3 MCU;STMicroelectronics;STM32F205;;1; ,,, Bluetooth Chip;Atheros;AR3012;AR3012-BL3D, FK5451LL, 1545 TW;1; ,,, 2.4GHz RF Front-End Module;RFMD (ANADIGICS);AWL9271;9271, 44009, AC PH, 1626;3; ,,, 5GHz RF Front-End Module;RFMD (ANADIGICS);AWL9571;9571, 44099, AC PH, 1636;3;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, 3A, 5V, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;M3Tek;MT3058;;1;,,, 3A, 4.5-27V Simple Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AOZ1212;;1;,,, 8-Bit Flash Microcontroller w/Embedded ICE and ISP;SONiX;SN8F26E611L;;1;,,, |flags=Bluetooth 4.0+EDR, |stock_os=Linux;4.1.6; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |oui=B4:FB:E4 |oui_eth=B4:FB:E4 }} {{TagLine|AmpliFi HD (High Density) Mesh Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.amplifi.com/}} {{•}} [https://amplifi.com/docs/AmpliFi_Datasheet.pdf AmpliFi Datasheet]
For use with the [[Ubiquiti Networks AmpliFi HD MeshPoint (AFi-P-HD)|AmpliFi HD MeshPoint]]
Consists of 4 boards: * Board containing antenna silkscreened with ''UHL ANTENNA BOARD'' * Board containing SOC, WiFi Radio, Bluetooth Radio, Flash and Memory silkscreened with ''WIFI ROUTER HD'' * Board containing Switch, USB Hub and Microcontroller silkscreened with ''AMPLIFI_ROUTER_BOT_TYPE_C'' * Board containing ARM Cortex-M3 attached to LCD Display
===Reviews=== * [https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2016/07/spending-some-time-with-ubiquiti-labs-amplifi-home-wi-fi-mesh-system/ Review on '''ArsTechnica'''] * [http://www.mbreviews.com/ubiquiti-amplifi-hd-review/ Review on '''MBReviews'''] * [http://koolshare.cn/thread-90317-1-1.html Review on '''KoolShare'''] ([http://koolshare.cn/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=90317&aid=143520&from=album&page=1 PCB images]) :[https://wk.baidu.com/view/84b0e2cf6bd97f192379e98b?pcf=2&re=view ''ANADIGICS'' WiFi Products (FEM)]
===See also=== *[[Ubiquiti Networks AmpliFi Router (AFi-R)]] - :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/SWX-AFR SWX-AFR] • IC ID: 6545A-AFR *[[Ubiquiti Networks AmpliFi MeshPoint (AFi-P)]] - :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/SWX-AFP SWX-AFP] • IC ID: 6545A-AFP *[[Ubiquiti Networks AmpliFi HD MeshPoint (AFi-P-HD)]] - :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/SWX-AFPHD SWX-AFPHD] • IC ID: 6545A-AFPHD
